Zeke. Zeke starts chucking balls at Tony.

ZEKE (CONT’D) I’m twenty three, I can’t be seen at this party and I can’t be the face of this whole thing.

He is the biggest piece of shit I've ever met in my life. Mo turns the car on and tries to back out of the driveway ZEKE (CONT’D) (to himself) God your sister is so hot. Sophie?  62.

Sneak out. Come after your parents go to sleep.
Listen man, I said I can’t.
I am begging you. Just then the two boys see Danny and Josh being escorted of the principals office.
What were Josh and Danny doing in Mr. Wool’s office.
What?
Look, Danny and Josh were just talking to Mr. Wool.
I don’t know man. That could be anything.
Fuck this.
You are being paranoid man.
The school is on to us. I’ve got to sneak out of my house. I’m the only one taking a risk.
We're all taking risks baby.
Don’t call me baby.
You need to calm down Mo. Nobody knows anything. Mo hates having this conversation in school.  72.
Will you just keep it down.
So we have a deal?
The price is going up.
I love you. I fucking love you. Oh by the way you think you could bring some ecstasy.
What do I look like to you?
Is this a trick question? Mo just stares at him.
Ya know what. Forget about ecstasy. I have a huge exam tomorrow anyway.
Mo's parents are in the kitchen drinking wine and talking

INSERT - TEXT FROM SOPHIE: “MO?” It kills him but he ignores it. Zeke better be right. Mo is in his room directly above them, moving around quie He puts on camouflage pants and a camouflage shirt. He go to the bathroom where he has laid out green and black fac paint. He paints his face. Mo moves to the window of his bedroom.

We see Mo open the window and climb out onto the ledge of house. The second floor isn’t that high up, but Mo’s heig makes the drop seem much scarier. He grabs on to a nearby tree and tries his best to shimmy to the ground. Eventual he falls off and lands in some bushes. From the kitchen window his parents are oblivious to the whole thing.  73. Trying to stay under the view of the window, he crawls to end of the driveway.

Mo walks into the house. The banner reads “GI JOES AND AR HOS”. Our hero blends in nicely in a sea of military fati (and camo underwear. ) Eppy is on his knees drinking from a beer bong, but the crowed surrounding him rushes over to greet Mo, leaving h alone on his knees holding the giant funnel to his mouth. Sophie sees Mo and waves. Ignoring her, he walks with a g of boys to the bathroom. INT. ZEKE’S APARTMENT Zeke is on his couch with a bowl of cereal. He is in his boxers and has the phone pinned between his shoulder and ear.
You have a pretty voice.
One of the phone bank girls, ALLISON.
Mr. Presanti, the bidding is up to six thousand.
Would you like to have dinner with me?
Mr. Presanti, if you want to just tell me your maximum bid, I will just bid to your max and you don’t need to sit on the phone.
You aren’t enjoying talking to me as much as I am.
I am in the middle of an auction.  74.
Can you go someplace quiet? She laughs. ZEKE (CONT’D) I am making you laugh. Do you have a boyfriend?
This is really inappropriate.
Something tells me there aren’t any rules about flirting with prospective buyers. Something tells me it is recommended or they wouldn't have such pretty girls like yourself working the phones.
I don’t have a boyfriend.
Of course you don’t. I was recently broken up with.
Why did she break up with you? As Allison talks she makes silent handmotions to the auctioneer raising his bid at will.

I don’t know. (he turns to the other room) Why did you break up with me? Holly walks from the kitchen through the living room carr a bag of her stuff. She gives him the middle finger on he way out. ZEKE (CONT’D) I think it’s still a little raw. The auctioneer bangs the podium.
Congratulations, you are now the proud owner of an 8,000 dollar Fujikawa painting.  75.
Is it any good?
Meh.
Mo comes out of the bathroom first. He looks around the p and then we track behind him to the front door like we al do, except before he can make his escape somebody blocks exit.
What is wrong with you?
Excuse me?
You have been a dick to me all week.
I know - I’m not, I--
You didn’t seem like an asshole but maybe that’s your secret. You’re a secret asshole. She starts to walk away.
I’m not. It wasn’t my idea. I’m sorry. Zeke thought if I didn’t give you attention you would like me more.
You are an idiot.
I know. A big idiot. Huge one. Please. Give me another chance. I won’t mess it up. She looks at him.
Let’s go on a real date. None of this dress up bullshit. Let’s go out for real.  76.
You gonna take anymore advice from your friend?
He’s dead to me I swear! INT. MO’S CAR - MOMENTS LATER With smeared face paint Mo drives home completely ecstati He sings DAVID BOWIE - YOUNG AMERICAN’S at the top of his lungs as he drives.

head_text.subj: KIDS AT THE PARTY DANCING AND MAKING OUT

text: EXT. MO’S HOUSE - NIGHT Mo stands in front of his window trying to jump up and re the tree branch. He can’t do it. He gives it a running st but still no luck.
Oh fuck it. He walks in the front door.
Three obscured boys in army fatigues drive in a cloud of smoke and sing along with the radio.
The principal sits at his desk with a uniformed police officer standing behind him. They talk to a man and woman  77.

I just don’t want there to be any confusion between us. I don’t want you to think that your son is off the hook, because he is not. The only reason you are sitting here talking to us is because I ama practical person. I am not trying to clog a leak with my finger I am trying to build a dam. I am trying to rid this community of all the underage drinking and drugs that go on almost every night. Jonathan was behind the wheel of a car, not only drunk, but stoned on marijuana and cocaine. And like I said the only reason you are sitting here today is because I want to know who is responsible for selling these drugs to him and his friends. We pan from the distraught parents to reveal Epstein sitt in the corner of the office, holding back tears.

Principal Wool has been very generous in allowing to keep Jonathan enrolled in school on the basis of his cooperation. MONROE’S HOUSE - DAY His parents are sitting at the table. Reuben is reading t paper.
Monroe wants to go out.
To a party? Not a chance-
On a date. Reuben is impressed.
My Monroe? With who?
Sophie something.
What does she look like?  78.
Does it matter?
No of course not, I was just- It’s your call, I don’t care.
I don’t like him driving after that car accident.
So say no.
Well I don’t want to take this away from him-
So say yes, for christ sake what do you want from me?
Maybe we can send him with somebody, have somebody else drive?
Reuben answers the front door for Zeke.
Hi Isaac.
Mr. Kaufman.
Come on in.
The four of them sit around the kitchen table.
You understand Zeke this is a special privilege for Mo.
Yes.  79.
A group of boys in Monroe’s class got in a car accident, there were drugs AND alcohol in their system.
Oh my goodness.
Do we really have to do this?
Will you go wait for Isaac in his car. Isaac throws him his car keys, Mo leaves the room.
No drinking. No drugs.
Got it. But what about Mo?
What?
It was a joke.
Sherri is very worried about these kids drunk driving around.
I would never let anything happen to Mo.

Listen Isaac, I like you. And that Eddie Haskel shit works wonders on Sherri but not me. I work in advertising... so... (off Zeke’s unsure look) Mo looks up to you, he never had an older brother, and that’s how he’s always seen you.
I understand.
I’m not your father. Just-just sometimes I think you and your friends forget he is sixteen.  80.
Yes sir. Reuben takes a twenty dollar bill out of his pocket and s it into Zeke’s hand. ZEKE (CONT’D) Mr. Kaufman, I can’t.
Please take it.
I like hanging out with Mo, it isn’t a job.
That’s why I am giving you this. Because it is a job. If he starts smoking dope and drinking, you aren’t doing your job.
Well I think he’s a pretty good kid.
I do too.
So can I have a raise?
Get out of my house. INT. ZEKE’S CAR - LATER The boys are driving to pick up Sophie.
Listen, do me a favor.
What?
Don’t be you tonight.
(laughing) Who would you like me to be?  81.
I’m serious. Your shitty advice almost cost me this date. I just don’t want tonight to be the Zeke show.
The Zeke show! ?
You know what I mean. You don’t always have to be the bride at every wedding and the corpse at every funeral.
How long have you been waiting to use that one?
A while.
You need to relax.
Don’t tell me to relax, I am very relaxed. Why? Do I not seem relaxed, fuck it. Turn around.
Do you not trust me?
I trust you.
Would you even be going on a date if it wasn’t for me?
I am going on this date in spite of you.
Would you have kissed her if it wasn’t for me?
What kind of credit are you looking for here? The car pulls up in front of Sophie’s house. Zeke honks t horn.  82.
Don’t do that. I’ll go get her.
No you won’t. Trust me, this is better. ZEKE (CONT’D) Here, take this. He pulls out a small pill from the pocket of his jean jac
What is it?
It’s a Valium. It will chill you out. Make you much more appealing.
Actually?
Yeah.
Does it have any side effects?
No, just don’t drink too much.
I wasn’t planning on drinking at all.

Then you’1ll be great. He takes the pill. Then looks to the house. POV - Sophie coming out. She looks great. Zeke opens the middle compartment and then back in his pocket. Then around as if he is searching for something.
What’s wrong?
Don’t freak out.
About what?  83.
I think I just gave you an Ambien.
What? Sophie is almost at the car.
(he takes a pill out of the bottom of the cup holder) Because here is the valium and I only had one.
What kind of an operation are you running here?
It’s going to be okay.
You gave me a sleeping pill, why would you even bring that?
It was an accident. He looks out the window. Frantic.
How long do I have?
Minutes.
Minutes?
Maybe twenty good ones. Sophie reaches her hand to open the back door.
Abort. Abort. Drive the car. Zeke starts to drive the car. Sophie is confused.
No, stop. Fuck. The car stops. Sophie gets in.  84.
(half laughing, half serious) What was that?
I’m sorry, Zeke drives like a retard. Zeke shoots him a look. Then looks at Sophie.
Is this your idea of not involving Zeke in our relationship?
I’m sorry, I didn’t want this either.
Hey, I’ve got feelings you two.
Where are we going?
Yeah Romeo, where are we going.
(scared to death) Something fast I think. Right?
I have nowhere to be.
(starting to enjoy this) Me either.
I thought you had that thing in twenty minutes Zeke? That appointment?
No I am severely unemployed thanks for reminding me.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, it’s fine.  85.
He’s just nervous I think. Would you relax? You guys have already kissed right? ZEKE (CONT’D) (to Sophie) He kissed you right?
Yes. Mo is mortified.
(to Mo) See dude you're fine, the hardest part is over. (to Sophie) How was he?
Oh for the love of god would you-
He was good.
What?
Don’t sound so surprised buddy I bet you were great. Mo has a very pleased look on his face. ZEKE (CONT’D) Okay youngins, where is this love bus going?
I don’t know. (to Sophie) Whatever you want to do.
Never tell a girl you’1l do whatever she wants, pretty soon she is going to want to do your friends.
(sotto) Zeke show?  86.
Sorry, I’m just trying to help.
Ice cream?
Are you asking her or-
Ice cream!
There it is.
He really is your relationship coach.
He’s more of a sociopath than a coach. She laughs. Zeke looks to Mo and gives him a thumbs up.
(mouths ) You're doing great.
(mouths ) Fuck you.
They sit outside at a picnic table eating. Mo is holding consciousness for dear life.
Okay I’ve got one.
Alright go.
Would you rather every time you take a shower Gatorade comes out of the faucet Or-
That's gross. Can I shower in the sink?  87.
Hmm. No. You can drink water but any time it touches your body it is Gatorade. OR Everything you eat from now on will taste like pickles. No matter what the fuck it is, it tastes like pickles.
I like pickles.
Every day for every meal for the rest of your life?
It’s better than pouring sticky colored water all over myself. (to Mo) What would you do?
Which one is that bad guy?
Excuse me? Mo forces an out of place laugh.
Sort of tastes like breakfast food even though you wouldn’t right or no? No. Zeke shakes him.
Hang in there buddy.
You know what would go great with this ice cream? Pyramids.
Is he having a stroke.
It’s not me fault. You’re pretty I like you you're pretty.
(Sotto to Mo) Stop fighting it, you’re making it worse.  88.
(shutting his eyes) I'm just closing for one minutes. Not even. Mo falls asleep, collapsing into his cup of Mint Chocolat Chip.
Oh my god. INT. ZEKE’S CAR - MOMENTS LATER Zeke and Sophie sit in the front. Monroe is asleep but propped up in the back seat.
Well this is a strange situation
Yeah.
Listen, don’t let this whole, Mo passing out thing turn you off. He really is a great guy. And this is probably like 10 percent my fault.
You guys are really running a great operation over here.
That's what he said! See you two are perfect for each other. (then) Okay, let’s get you home.
Monroe's older sister answers the door. Zeke is holding M like a baby in his arms.
(as if nothing was wrong) Hey Kate.
Oh my god what’s wrong with him.  89.

(annoyed at her lack of manners ) How about: Hi Zeke. Nice to see you. How are you? It’s been a long time. This is a nice surprise. You look great. Did you lose some weight? I can’t stop thinking about you.
Does he need to go to the hospital?
(Stepping into the house) No, he took an Ambien. Accidentally. I let him out of my sight for one second and you know- (then) You've done a little redecorating since the last time we were here.
You drugged him? Is he going to be okay?
You know I recently came into a small collection of art myself. A few Cutlers, a Fujikawa print. Mostly up and comers. You should come over some time and check it out.
I’m calling my parents.
Please don’t. He’s fine I promise. He just needs to sleep this off. Can I put him down somewhere?
Put him on the couch. Zeke walks over to the couch and lays him down. He waits until Kate is looking in his direction and then kisses Mo the forehead.
(for her benefit) It’s going to be okay buddy.  90.
So what I just wait until he wakes up and then take him home?

I would really feel more comfortable waiting with him. Your parents aren’t expecting him home for a few hours, he’1ll be up by then. She looks at him, knowing full well what he’s doing. ZEKE (CONT’D) Your Dad gave me a big speech, there may have been a cash bribe. I don’t want him to think he can’t trust me with Mo’s safety.
(indicating her passed out brother) Yeah I don’t know why he would ever think that. Mo looks up to you. You have to take better care of him.
(defensive) I reuse those pill bottles over and over. It’s very hard to keep track. (He looks to Mo then turns back to Kate) Do you have any water or something?
That’s a good idea, do you think he’1l drink it.
I meant more for me. She rolls her eyes and walks into the other room. Zeke lo around at the house. ZEKE (CONT’D) So where’s what-his-face?
(from the other room) You know his name.
Where is Doug?  gl.
Doug is at an opening.
That sounds about right, what a prick. Why didn’t you go?
I didn’t feel like getting dressed up. Zeke looks at his sleeping friend on the couch and then g up and goes to the kitchen. He comes up from behind and p his arms around her.
You know if you were my girlfriend, you would never have to get dressed up for anything. She pretends not to like what’s going on.
Of course not, we would just smoke pot and watch Top Gun every night until we starved to death. She turns around so they are face to face.
You aren’t a kid anymore. But he is. And you aren’t doing him any favors. Getting him stoned before my Dad’s birthday. Drugging him like this, and god knows what else.
(thinking about everything else) That's pretty much it.

It’s obvious that he hangs out with you so he can feel cool. But one day he is going to wake up and realize you are just hanging out with him because you need to feel cool too, and he is the last person on earth who thinks you are. And then he won't. This lands hard with Zeke. He drops his head, this is the most vulnerable we’ve seen him.  92.
I’m sorry. That was maybe too far. He lifts his head and kisses her.
(pulling away) What are you doing?
I just thought-
THAT is what you took away from what I just said? Long silence.
I love you.
Don’t say that. Even if it’s true don’t say it. He kisses her hard, this time she doesn’t pull away.
INT. ZEKE’S CAR - LATER Mo slowly wakes up and tries to get his bearings. He is sitting in the passenger seat. They are parked in front o Mo's house.
What happened?
You did great tonight buddy.
I fell asleep. (waking up) You drugged me. (very awake) Oh god you son of a bitch what did you do?
It’s fine. Everything is fine. Relax.
Don’t tell me to relax. The last time you told me to relax I passed out in my Ice Cream. Oh fuck, I need to call her.
No no man, it was cool. Like you didn’t give a shit. Like you couldn’t be bothered to stay awake.

You really are a psycho. Mo get’s out of the car. Zeke sits in the car. Thinking about what Kate about this boy who’s life he continues to mess up the music and drives away. EXT. MO’S HOUSE - SAME TIME Before Mo can make it to the front door he get’ call.
Hello? - Right now? - Is everything okay? - I’m sort of - Nothing - Can it wait until tomorrow? Okay I’m on my way. Mo walks to his car and get’s in.
He rings the buzzer.
It’s me. The front door buzzes and he rushes in.
said. Thinking up. He turns s a phone Holly opens the front door, she is in a towel, fresh out the shower. She holds an empty drink in her hand and Mo c smell the whiskey coming out of her pores.
What’s wrong?  94.
Come in.
You made it seem like you were in trouble.
Oh stop being dramatic.
(still panting a little) Me? You literally said “come quick I’m in trouble.”
You are hilarious. (Then) I’m going to go get dressed. Make us a refill.
Um-— He walks over to the bar she has set up in the corner of studio apartment.
I have to be up really early tomorrow, I should probably-
So just because me and Zeke broke up you don’t want to be my friend anymore? That’s pretty lame.
No it’s not that.
One drink. I just want to catch up. He gives up. She puts on a record, something sexy.

Your apartment is very adult. He fumbles his way around the bar trying to remember how makes whiskey sours. When he finally finishes he brings the drinks into the ro where Holly is sitting at a white vanity next to her bed. is completely naked combing her hair. He can see her body reflected in the mirror. She smiles at him.  95.
(gulping) I thought you just wanted to catch up? She puts on a turquoise silk robe and stands up to face h
You don’t want to-
You are a really good guy. His voice cracks.
Thanks.
You are a lot better than your friend.
Well I- I don’t think it’s a competition. We both have our strengths-— She opens her robe.
-and weaknesses.
Have you ever thought about doing this with me?
Yes. She pushes him onto the bed. SFX - A crowd cheering
Mo walks up to the plate. Everybody in the stands are chearing for him, including Zeke, Tony and Nick. Mo clear has a pit in his stomach. The first ball flies by.
Strike.  96. He looks at Zeke who motions for him to get lower. Mo crouches down. The pitch...
Ball 1
He’s too short, I have nowhere to put the ball.
(yelling from the stands) Hey asshole I’1l show you where you can put the ball. The pitch...
Ball 2. Angle on the boys clapping. Angle on Mo looking at Zeke, feeling terrible.
I’m worried about Mo.
What about him?
I think we are getting him in over his head. The pitch...
Ball 3.
He’s loving it.
He’s loving it because he thinks he’s impressing us.
So what do you want to do?
I don’t know, I think he is just losing it a little. Those kids crashed the car, and the roofie date. I’m just worried-  97.
(Godfather impression) This is not the life I wanted for my boy. The pitch....
Ball 4. Take your base. Mo walks to first base.

(yelling from the stands) There you go baby. Just like that. Every time, every fucking time. (sitting down) Love that little shrimp. INT. MO’S ROOM - NIGHT It’s snowing outside. Mo is on the phone as he looks out window and sees Nick and Tony pull up outside the mailbox
They just got here. ZEKE’S APARTMENT Zeke is talking on his bluetooth while doing crunches.
Alright. You okay?
Yeah, I’m good. Do I not seem good? I’m good. I swear.
Are you just nervous about seeing Sophie?
No, no. I mean, yeah sort of.
Well don’t worry, it’s going to be great. I know she likes you. You already have it on lock.
You think?  98.
You're going to do great.
Alright, I’1l talk to you after. Mo hangs up feeling like a big asshole.

We track behind Mo as he walks into the party. This is ea the biggest house we’ve seen yet. Snow covers the front y The banner in front reads “Christmas Bros and Ho Ho Hos” Unlike everybody else, Mo didn’t really feel like dressin like Santa.
He sees a girl he recognizes.
Hey do you know if Sophie is here?
No.

No she’s not here or no you don’t know? The girl is gone before he can finish his sentence. INT. ZEKE’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Zeke is playing video games and eating cereal in his underwear. There is a knock at the door. He get’s up to answer it. It’s Holly, she has been crying
Hey you okay? Come in. Without saying anything she moves to the couch and tries catch her breath. ZEKE (CONT’D) What’s wrong?
I miss you.  99.
Hol.
I know I screwed up with the whole Mo thing.
What whole Mo thing?
Mo walks out of the bathroom, shoving a wad of cash in hi pocket. On the other side of the party we see Epstein wea an elaborate Santa costume. He watches Mo. Mo tries one more time...
Hey have you seen Sophie?
Who's Sophie?
Never mind.
Eppy, stands in front of the house on the phone.

Yes, Officer Peters? It’s Jonathan Epstein. The kid you are looking for is at 2253 Ridgeland. (hating what he is doing) Yes, I saw the drugs. We are tight on Epstein but can still make out the boomin party behind him. EPPY (CONT’D) Yes. His name is Monroe Kaufman. He hangs up the phone feeling embarrassed and pathetic.
Mo is about to leave the party when Sophie walks in.
There you are.
You looking for me?
Yes.
Well I’m here. Are you leaving?

No. Not anymore. He turns around and walks back in with her. INT. ZEKE’S CAR - SAME TIME Zeke is driving his car and stuffing his face with a cheeseburger and smoking a joint and singing along with Ashanti’s Foolish on the radio.
(to himself) My Mo?
Mo and Sophie are off in the corner watching drunk kids acting drunk and stupid. Mo is nervous, he keeps opening mouth to talk and then decides not to until...
I’m sorry about the other night.
It’s okay. Zeke told me what happened.
I think I am realizing that Zeke may have no idea what he is talking about. It’s hard to hear him over the music.
You want to go upstairs?
Um, yeah, sure. They leave the kitchen and walk up stairs into a bedroom We see Epstein dressed as Santa looking angry at the worl He watches them go upstairs, then chugs his beer.
Mo closes the door.
Hi.

What were you saying? Sophie sits down on the bed. ZEKE’S CAR —- SAME TIME Still driving, eating and singing. He slows down when he three police cars turn down a nearby subdivision. He look the street sign and instantly knows where they are going. throws the joint out the window, eats a breathmint, spray some freshener and makes a U-turn. As he turns onto the street he is stopped by one of the police cars. Their lights are off and they are forming a quiet barricade. An officer walks to his window.
Sorry, this street is closed off.
What’s going on?
Some house party got out of hand. Kids selling drugs.
(now very worried) Do you know who?
We are going to need you to take another way home.
It could just be somebody watching TV too loudly. You shouldn’t jump to conclusions.  102.
Either way sir you need to keep moving.
This seems like a real waste of manpower for a little house party. People are getting shot up in the street for god sake.
Sir are you saying you are aware of a shooting going on right now?
What? No? What? I’m just- this is my tax dollars at work man.
Sir if you don’t-
I’m going I’m going. Zeke pulls his car around the corner and parks it. He get out and starts running through backyards towards the big house at the end of the street.
Mo is pacing back and forth in front of the bed.
Can we start over and have a first date so that we can have a first date where I didn’t pass out in front of you and my sister’s ex- boyfriend--
Sure...

--but also not totally start over to before we kissed, because that was stressful enough and this time I‘1l just tell you how much I like you instead of taking Zeke’s advice to play it cool because let’s face it Zeke’s advice can only really get me as far as Zeke and is that how far I want to go, you know? I don’t know. I’m--  103.
(interrupting his rant) How much do you like me? Mo snaps to attention.
I really like you.
I like you too. You know I liked you before I met Zeke. I liked that you never tried to fit in.
Ya? He sits down on the bed next to her.
Yeah I thought you were like some cool mysterious bad boy that played by his own rules.
(sarcastic) Oh yeah, that’s totally me. Mister bad ass. They kiss.
Three cops burst through the front door. Forty Santas and slutty elves scream and run in every direction.
Nobody move. Where the hell is Monroe Kaufman. They look at a nearby coffee table where a bag of cocaine been left out.
Don’t let anybody out.
Where is Monroe Kaufman?
(pointing upstairs) He’s upstairs in that bedroom.  104.
They stop kissing.
Did you hear my name?
Of course I heard your name the cops are screaming it. Mo jumps up.
I was really hoping that was in my head.
Zeke is almost there. He is trudging through the deep sno
Fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck.
A loud knock on the door.
Monroe Kaufman are you in there? Open this door. This is the police.
Oh my god.
How do they know your name? Mo starts pacing around the room, not sure what to do. Shit shit shit shit shit.
Fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck.
Shit shit shit shit shit.  105.

What is going on? Mo moves to the window at the opposite end of the room. I faces the backyard. He opens the window and looks down. T is a large patch of soft powdery snow, enough to cushion fall. He climbs out onto the ledge.
What are you doing? Mo looks out the window.
They’1l never take me alive.
What?
No, I’m kidding. They’1l totally take me alive. He kisses her then jumps out of the window. He falls through the soft powder...
..-into the frozen over swimming pool.
Mo is struggling. Trying to find a way out of the frozen pool. Everything goes silent.
Zeke gets to the backyard of the house and looks around frantically. He sees Sophie in the second floor window. S points to the pool.

Terrified, Mo closes his eyes and curls up in the fetal position. Zeke appears under the water swimming towards Mo. As Zeke pulls Mo to the surface, several twenty dollar bi fall out of his pockets and float around them.  106.

Zeke emerges, soaking wet with Mo, who is unconscious, th over his shoulder. The music swells. Zeke turns away from the house and runs with his friend i the woods. Zeke carries Mo deep into the snowy woods as fast as he c INT. EPSTEIN’S PARENTS MINIVAN - SAME TIME Epstein sits in the backseat looking out in the window as kids run in every direction from the house. He destroyed only thing he ever loved. A tear falls down his face as t busted up party fades into the white snowy darkness. INT. ZEKE’S APARTMENT - BATHROOM We push in on Zeke’s shower. He is fully dressed holding friend, trying to warm him up under the hot water. INT. ZEKE’S APARTMENT —- LIVING ROOM Mo comes out of the room, he is wearing new clothes that way too big on him and drying his hair with a towel. Zeke is sitting on the couch.
I’m so screwed. They know my name. They can find me. I can’t live here forever. It’s not big enough.
Did you sleep with Holly?
Oh fuck. No.
Mo.
I am so sorry. Zeke, you have to understand. It happened so fast and I had never- and she- and the towel- Wait why are we even talking about this? My life is over. (MORE )
